title: S16 Ep48: UFOs and Bigfoot Prove the Bible is True w/Jason McLean
itunes:title: UFOs and Bigfoot Prove the Bible is True w/Jason McLean
description:
Darkness Radio presents UFOs & Bigfoot Prove the Bible is True! with guest Jason McLean.

Dave & Tim dust off the bible and discuss the questions, Are UFOs, aliens, cryptozoological animals and other paranormal activity evidence that the Christian worldview is wrong? Or does the Bible give us reason to predict that dinosaurs and strange visitors bent on creating a hybrid race would haunt our modern planet? Moreover, what should the Church do about it? Discover the answers to these questions and many others today with our special guest Jason McLean.

Get the book here: https://amzn.to/2ROfnjL
itunes:author: Darkness Radio
